description:
The clown says ""It is all normal, a new normal."" But what is normal in first place? 

Normal is a norm. 

It is a pattern that determines the world we live in. The norm is established by the unspoken thoughts that are the first thought that comes to our minds. It influences the course of our lives and creates a new normal. The changing of the norm, especially in a society that is globally interconnected, is very dangerous. With the rise of new technology, new lifestyles and altered thoughts, we are changing the natures of bodies. 

The new world is becoming normal in the same way that the old world is becoming normal in the same ways that the New world was normal before. 

Where does it lead us? 
Binary life is the one, the only order that keeps the rhythm of life they say. But they don't wish best for the humanity. They want us to be slaves. 

They want us to live only for machines. 

I bet they already have a mouse brain, just to get the wheels of their machinery moving. 

But we, we have the other potential. We have the real potential. And this is how I live, my life, every day, in the farthest reality from the only possible norm, because my destiny is written in the stars and is being lived out every day.
.
.
.
.
⏳ Day 1084 selling my painting ""Es and Pua"". Price: $2M
/ - acrylic on canvas  145 x 110 cm
Follow  ⏸ @pausepainting ⏸
.
.
.
.
.
